actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to require the inclusion of certain compensation in the computation of benefits if that compensation is taxed for railroad retirement purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to include specified Social Security payments in the computation of benefits if such payments are subject to Federal tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to require the inclusion of certain compensation in the computation of benefits if that compensation is taxed for railroad retirement purposes.
